summary: AN ORDINANCE approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6730 for the improvement of The Alley in Block 5, Plat of Sunrise Heights, being the alley between 32nd Avenue Southwest and 31st Avenue Southwest from Southwest Webster Street to Southwest Othello Street, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof upon the property within the district; and establishing a local improvement fund.
